markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Replicate](/Feats.aspx?ID=3799) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Reflection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=431" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 121</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Clone-Risen](/Feats.aspx?ID=3792)

</column>

---

You've learned to reshape your malleable form. You can cast [_illusory disguise_](/Spells.aspx?ID=159) once per day as an innate occult spell. This is a [transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157) and [morph](/Traits.aspx?ID=113) effect, as your body physically transforms, rather than an illusion effect.
name: Replicate

You can cast illusory disguise once per day as an innate occult spell. This is a transmutation and morph effect, as your body physically transforms, rather than an illusion effect.
